sentences.en: He is conducting a point-by-point rebuttal of charges from former colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他正在对前同事的指责逐条加以驳斥。

sentences.en: If your dad shoots off his mouth at your party, you can make a calm rebuttal.
sentences.cn: 如果你爸爸在你的晚会上高谈别人的秘密, 你可以很冷静地制止他.

sentences.en: That brought a pointed rebuttal as well.
sentences.cn: 这个问题也引起了一阵尖锐的反驳.

sentences.en: The controlling in teaching course has been in rebuttal, especially in the Chinese teaching field.
sentences.cn: 对教学过程中的“控制”更是大加挞伐.在语文教学领域, 这种现象尤甚.

sentences.en: The rebuttal to Popper's scientific knowledge growth pattern.
sentences.cn: 对波普尔科学知识增长模式的反驳.

sentences.en: The rebuttal to this argument is equally simple: People create resources.
sentences.cn: 要反驳这个观点同样也很简单: 人会创造资源.

sentences.en: They made a clause - by - clause rebuttal of the letter.
sentences.cn: 他们对这封信 逐句 作了反驳.

trans.tran_en: If you make a rebuttal of a charge or accusation that has been made against you, you make a statement that gives reasons why the accusation is untrue
